languages.text: {n}Новая порция шипения из вокса:{/n} "Иокаста, у нас не хватает храбрых людей. Мы будем благодарны, если ваши люди отложат оружие и направятся на подмогу Гильдии Инфернус. Чем скорее приступите, тем больше жизней спасем".

{n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."
languages.original_text: {n}Новая порция шипения из вокса:{/n} "Иокаста, у нас не хватает храбрых людей. Мы будем благодарны, если ваши люди отложат оружие и направятся на подмогу Гильдии Инфернус. Чем скорее приступите, тем больше жизней спасем".

traits.locale_text: {n}A new burst of hissing comes from the vox:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short of brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

{n}A new burst of hissing comes from the vox:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short of brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

{n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

{n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

{n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

{n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

languages.text: {n}Un nuevo estallido de siseos brota del voco amplificador:{/n} «Jocasta, se nos acaban los valientes. Agradecería mucho que su gente bajara las armas y acudiera a ayudar al gremio Infernus. Cuanto antes vengan, más vidas podremos salvar».
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un nuevo estallido de siseos brota del voco amplificador:{/n} «Jocasta, se nos acaban los valientes. Agradecería mucho que su gente bajara las armas y acudiera a ayudar al gremio Infernus. Cuanto antes vengan, más vidas podremos salvar».

languages.text: {n}新たな音声が、音声通信送受信装置から響く。{/n}「ジョカスタ、勇敢な人材が足りません。そちらから武器を捨てて、インフェルヌス・ギルドの救出に来てくれたらありがたいです。到着が早い分、それだけ多くの命が救われます」
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

traits.locale_text: {n}新たな音声が、音声通信送受信装置から響く。{/n}「ジョカスタ、勇敢な人材が足りません。そちらから武器を捨てて、インフェルヌス・ギルドの救出に来てくれたらありがたいです。到着が早い分、それだけ多くの命が救われます」

languages.text: {n}通讯器里又传来了一阵嘶嘶声。{/n}“约卡斯塔，我们这些勇敢的人快要死光了。如果你的人能放下武器，协助控火行会的成员，我们将不胜感激。你们来得越早，能挽救的生命就越多。”
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

traits.locale_text: {n}通讯器里又传来了一阵嘶嘶声。{/n}“约卡斯塔，我们这些勇敢的人快要死光了。如果你的人能放下武器，协助控火行会的成员，我们将不胜感激。你们来得越早，能挽救的生命就越多。”

languages.text: {n}Erneut ertönt ein Zischen aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Jocasta, uns gehen die mutigen Männer aus. Wir wären dankbar, wenn Eure Leute die Waffen niederlegen und der Infernus-Gilde zur Hilfe eilen könnten. Je eher Ihr kommt, desto mehr Leben können wir retten."
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

traits.locale_text: {n}Erneut ertönt ein Zischen aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Jocasta, uns gehen die mutigen Männer aus. Wir wären dankbar, wenn Eure Leute die Waffen niederlegen und der Infernus-Gilde zur Hilfe eilen könnten. Je eher Ihr kommt, desto mehr Leben können wir retten."

languages.text: {n}L'émetteur vox produit une nouvelle volée de grésillements :{/n} « Jocasta, on commence à manquer d'hommes ici. On vous serait reconnaissants si vos hommes pouvaient ranger leurs armes et venir porter assistance à la guilde infernus. Plus vous viendrez tôt, plus on pourra sauver de vies. »
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'émetteur vox produit une nouvelle volée de grésillements :{/n} « Jocasta, on commence à manquer d'hommes ici. On vous serait reconnaissants si vos hommes pouvaient ranger leurs armes et venir porter assistance à la guilde infernus. Plus vous viendrez tôt, plus on pourra sauver de vies. »

languages.text: {n}Voksyayardan yeniden cızırtı sesi yükseliyor.{/n} "Jocasta, cesur adamlarımızın sayısı giderek azalıyor. Emrindekiler silah bırakır ve gelip İtfa Loncası'na destek olursa çok seviniriz. Ne kadar çabuk gelirseniz o kadar çok hayat kurtarabiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}A new burst of hisses emanates from the vox-caster:{/n} "Jocasta, we are running short on brave men. We would be grateful if your people would lay down their weapons and come to assist the Infernus Guild. The sooner you come, the more lives we can save."
